description:
Good afternoon,ladies and gentlemen,my dear classmates.
  First,I want to ask a question:Do you love your school?
  School are students second home.Every student loves their school.I like my school very much.My school is very beautiful.My school is very great.It is the best school.My school taught many excellent students.
  It's one of the best primary schools in my city. There are more than 1,500 students in our school. There are three tall buildings in our school. They all have five floors.Two of them are teaching buildings. The other is library and gym. The teaching buildings are huge and the classroom is large and bright. There are plenty of books in the library.The library is on the second floor. The science rooms are on the third floor. The computer rooms are on the third floor and the fourth floor. In another building,the P.E.room is on the first floor. The music rooms are on the third floor and the fourth floor. My class room is on the fifth floor. I am in Class five， Grade five. 
  There are five gardens in our school. In the gardens there are many beautiful flowers，grass and trees. There is a big playground in my school.
  I usually get up at 6:15 in the morning. Then I do morning exercises in the playground. At 6:40, I have my breakfast. You can see many students and teachers in the dinning room. After breakfast, I often read English with my classmates.
  We have six classes every day. The first class begins at 7:50 am. I like all the classes for my teachers can make the classes lively and interesting.My favorite subject is English, so I join English Corner every week. I can speak English with many other students there. It's very interesting and exciting. I think it's helpful for me to learn English well. After class, I always play games with my friends. We play soccer ball,basketball, volleyball, ping-pong and so on. They are very relaxing.
  The teachers in my school are very kind . The students are very polite and smart. I am happy in my school.
  I like my lessons, my friends and my teachers. In a word, I love my school. I find my school life more and more meaningful and colorful. My school life is wonderful, isn't it?
  I love my school.My school welcomes you.are very nice and smart.I like my school.

  • 双语美文：你真的了解痛苦吗？
  • 国产修图app火了：老外表示我好美！爱死了！
  • 双语美文：你尽力了，但仍然会出问题
  • 特朗普就职演说已出！完整视频+双语字幕
  • 7个学习技巧，好成绩不再难
  • 囧研究：情商高不一定好 这些坏处你都想不到
  • 全世界最贵的房子 价值2.5亿美元的豪宅长啥样
  • 双语美文：米歇尔•奥巴马的8句经典名言

title: 小学英语演讲：我的学校
